alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:55PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pueblo County through 630 PM MDT... At 555 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Avondale, or 14 miles east of Pueblo. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Avondale and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
